document: [{'summary_text': ' Berkshire is often labeled a conglomerate, a negative term applied to holding companies that own a hodge-podge of unrelated businesses . label: {'neutral'}

document: [{'summary_text': ' Over time, conglomerates have generally limited themselves to buying businesses in their entirety . label: {'neutral'}
